data.description: <p style="text-align:inherit"></p><p style="text-align:left"><b>Team Name:</b></p><p style="text-align:inherit"></p><p style="text-align:inherit"></p><h2>Job Title:</h2>2026 US Summer Internships - Tech Art<p style="text-align:inherit"></p><h2>Requisition ID:</h2>R025921<p style="text-align:inherit"></p><h2>Job Description:</h2><div><div><p><span><span>At Activision Blizzard we are dedicated to creating the most epic entertainment experiences, driven by our company values and passion, Activision Blizzard creates worlds with the focus to entertain the universe. We are looking for talented and innovative students to join our team for the </span><span>2026 summer</span><span>. All interns will receive a meaningful project and an unparalleled experience. </span><span>We’ll</span><span> provide the tools and resources you need to learn. The challenging and creative work you do throughout your internship will directly </span><span>impact</span><span> the team you are contributing to. </span></span><span> </span></p></div><div><p><span> </span></p></div><div><p><span> </span></p></div><div><p><u><span>Player Profile</span></u><span><span> </span></span><span> </span></p></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>Currently enrolled in a certificate, associate’s, bachelor’s, or master’s degree program and graduating May 2026 – July 2027 </span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>Available to </span><span>participate</span><span> in a 12-week internship starting in late-May or mid-June</span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>Currently </span><span>residing</span><span> in the US or open to </span><span>relocating</span><span> oneself to the US</span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>Exhibits learning agility; </span><span>has the ability to</span><span> think differently, and/or grasp and apply new skills and concepts</span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>Approaches problems in a clear, well-organized, and solutions-oriented manner</span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>Works well with others and contributes to team tasks</span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>Able to effectively communicate problems, solutions, needs, or priorities</span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>Is engaged, </span><span>seeks</span><span> to learn, and </span><span>is able to</span><span> manage time effectively</span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>Candidates must apply with a resume and a link to their portfolio/reel to be considered</span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><p><span><span> </span></span><span> </span></p><p></p></div><div><p><u><span>Internship Opportunities</span></u><span> </span></p></div><div><p><b><span>All internships will be conducted in-person. </span></b><span><span>Hosting managers will </span><span>determine</span><span> when and how often interns work in the office. All interns will have the </span><span>option</span><span> to opt into relocation services (flights, trains, or car mileage reimbursement). Additionally, all interns will be provided with a living stipend to supplement housing, utility, commuting, and miscellaneous costs.</span></span><b><span> </span></b><span> </span></p></div></div><div><div><p><span> </span></p><p></p></div><div><p><b><span>Tech</span><span>nical</span><span> Art Intern</span><span>: </span></b><span><span>As a Tech</span><span>nical Artist,</span><span> </span><span>y</span></span><span><span>ou will </span><span>utilize</span><span> your creative problem-solving abilities across a wide range of technical solutions that are </span><span>operating</span><span> at a large scale</span><span> across ABK.</span></span><span> </span></p></div><div><p><span> </span></p></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>Skilled </span><span>with </span><span>3D applications such as</span><span> Maya</span><span>, Blender, </span><span>ZBrush</span><span>, Substance, </span><span>MotionBuilder</span><span>, etc.</span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>Experience with Unity, Unreal, or other game engines</span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>Knowledge of </span><span>coding language such as Python, Java, or </span><span>C++ and object-oriented programming practices</span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>Understanding of production/tracking tools (Jira)</span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>Strong communication</span><span> skills and technical problem-solving abilities</span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>Portfolio/reel </span><span>demonstrating</span><span> tech art related projects</span><span> (tools, rigging, TD work, </span><span>etc.</span><span>)</span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><p><span> </span></p></div><div><p><span><span><b>Hosting Locations:</b> Activision </span><span>Motion Capture Studio (</span><span>Playa Vista, CA</span><span>)</span></span><span> </span></p></div><div><p><span> </span></p></div><p></p><p></p><div><p><span> </span></p></div><div><p><b><span>Technical Art Intern: </span></b><span><span>As a Tech Art Intern</span><span>,</span><span> </span><span>y</span></span><span><span>ou’ll</span><span> use your understanding of game creation tools and production methods to help </span><span>maintain</span><span> and grow our ability to develop art assets and integrate them into the game.</span><span> </span><span>We’re</span><span> looking for a collaborative</span><span> </span><span>team player</span><span> </span><span>w</span><span>ho will work</span><span> </span><span>with a variety of engineers and artists across multiple</span><span> </span><span>disciplines.</span></span><span> </span></p></div><div><p><span> </span></p></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>Skilled with 3D applications such as Maya, Blender, </span><span>ZBrush</span><span>, Substance, etc.</span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>Experience with Unity, Unreal, or other game engines</span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>Knowledge of </span><span>scripting and/or </span><span>coding language such as Python, Java, or C++ and object-oriented programming practices</span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>Possess</span><span> a </span><span>strong </span><span>passion </span><span>and curiosity </span><span>for </span><span>technical problem-solving</span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div><div><ul><li><p><span><span>Portfolio/demo reel </span><span>demonstrating</span><span> tech art related projects (tools, rigging, TD work, etc.)</span></span><span> </span></p></li></ul></div></div><div><p><span> </span></p></div><div><p><span><span><b>Hosting Locations:</b> Infinity Ward (Woodland Hills, CA)</span></span><span> & Blizzard Entertainment (Irvine, CA)</span></p></div><div><p><span> </span></p></div><div><p><span> </span></p></div><div><p><u><span>Our World</span></u><span><span> </span></span><span> </span></p></div><div><p><span><span>Activision Blizzard, Inc., is one of the world's largest and most successful interactive entertainment companies and is at the intersection of media, </span><span>technology</span><span> and entertainment. We are home to some of the most beloved entertainment franchises including Call of Duty®, World of Warcraft®, Overwatch®, Diablo®, Candy Crush</span><span>™</span><span> and Bubble Witch™. Our combined entertainment network delights hundreds of millions of monthly active users in 196 countries, making us the largest gaming network on the planet!</span></span><span> </span></p></div><div><p><span> </span></p></div><div><p><span><span>Our ability to build immersive and innovative worlds is only enhanced by diverse teams working in an inclusive environment</span><span>. </span><span>We aspire to have a culture where everyone can thrive </span><span>in order to</span><span> connect and engage the world through epic entertainment. We provide a suite of benefits that promote physical, </span><span>emotional</span><span> and financial well-being for ‘Every World’ - </span><span>we’ve</span><span> got our employees covered!</span></span><span> </span></p></div><div><p><span> </span></p></div><div><p><span><span>The </span><span>video</span><span> </span><span>game</span><span> industry and therefore our business is fast-paced and will continue to evolve. As such, the duties and responsibilities of this role may be changed as directed by the Company at any time to promote and support our business and relationships with industry partners.</span></span><span> </span></p></div><div><p><span> </span></p></div><div><p><span><span>We love hearing from anyone who is enthusiastic about changing the games industry. Not sure you meet all </span><span>qualifications</span><span>? Let us decide! Research shows that women and members of other under-represented groups tend to not apply to jobs when they think they may not meet every qualification, when, in fact, they often do! At Activision Blizzard, we are committed to creating a diverse and inclusive environment and strongly encourage you to apply.</span></span><span> </span></p></div><div><p><span> </span></p></div><div><p><span><span>Activision Blizzard is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, </span><span>color</span><span>, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, national origin, protected veteran status, or any other basis protected by applicable law and will not be discriminated against </span><span>on the basis of</span><span> disability.</span></span><span> </span></p></div><div><p><span><span>We are committed to working with and providing reasonable </span><span>assistance</span><span> to individuals with physical and mental disabilities. If you are a disabled individual requiring an accommodation to apply for an open position, please email your request to </span></span><a href="mailto:accommodationrequests@activisionblizzard.com" target="_blank"><u><span>accommodationrequests@activisionblizzard.com</span></u></a><span><span> General employment questions cannot be accepted or processed here. Thank you for your interest.</span></span><span> </span></p></div><p style="text-align:inherit"></p><p style="text-align:inherit"></p><p><b>Rewards</b></p><p>We provide a suite of benefits that promote physical, emotional and financial well-being for ‘Every World’ - we’ve got our employees covered! Subject to eligibility requirements, the Company offers comprehensive benefits including:</p><ul><li>Medical, dental, vision, health savings account or health reimbursement account, healthcare spending accounts, dependent care spending accounts, life and AD&D insurance, disability insurance;</li><li>401(k) with Company match, tuition reimbursement, charitable donation matching;</li><li>Paid holidays and vacation, paid sick time, floating holidays, compassion and bereavement leaves, parental leave;</li><li>Mental health & wellbeing programs, fitness programs, free and discounted games, and a variety of other voluntary benefit programs like supplemental life & disability, legal service, ID protection, rental insurance, and others;</li><li>If the Company requires that you move geographic locations for the job, then you may also be eligible for relocation assistance.</li></ul><p></p><p>Eligibility to participate in these benefits may vary for part time and temporary full-time employees and interns with the Company. You can learn more by visiting <a href="https://www.benefitsforeveryworld.com/" target="_blank"><span><span>https://www.benefitsforeveryworld.com/</span></span></a>.</p><p style="text-align:inherit"></p><p style="text-align:inherit"></p>In the U.S., the standard base pay range for this role is $20.00 - $50.00 Hourly. These values reflect the expected base pay range of new hires across all U.S. locations. Ultimately, your specific range and offer will be based on several factors, including relevant experience, performance, and work location. Your Talent Professional can share this role’s range details for your local geography during the hiring process. In addition to a competitive base pay, employees in this role may be eligible for incentive compensation. Incentive compensation is not guaranteed. While we strive to provide competitive offers to successful candidates, new hire compensation is negotiable.
